title: Report on Grant Expenditures
description: A PI needs an official report of all expenditures for a grant that is ending to submit to the funding agency.

tasks.description: Identify the PI and the grant account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the identity of the PI and the grant.

tasks.description: Generate a complete financial report for the entire grant period from the financial system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the detailed expenditure report.

tasks.description: Review the report with the PI to ensure accuracy before they submit it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent and PI review the report together and confirm its accuracy.
